DOC.brief_summary: Prospective double blind study comparing two remifentanil dosing protocols (0.1 and 0.3 mcg/kg/min) during cardiac surgery. Main outcome measures are postoperative opioid requirements (PCA oxycodone) and postoperative pain (VAS, verbal rating scale).
DOC.brief_title: Requirement of Analgesics After Two Remifentanil Dosing Regimen in Cardiac Surgery.
DOC.criteria: Coronary artery bypass grafting patients Psychiatric disorders, sleep apnea, cardiac insufficiency
DOC.keyword: pain, postoperative, opioid, PCA, cardiac surgery
